ncmw.analysis.sekretion_uptake module¶

ncmw.analysis.sekretion_uptake.compute_all_uptake_sekretion_tables(models: list, fvas=None)[source]¶

Computes all uptake sekretion tables for all models.

Parameters

  • models – Cobra models

  • fvas – FVA results

Returns

List of tables.

Return type

list

ncmw.analysis.sekretion_uptake.compute_uptake_growth_relationship(ids, model, h=100, upper_bound=None)[source]¶

Computes the growth for multiple fixed flux values, while keeping the others variable.

ncmw.analysis.sekretion_uptake.compute_uptake_sekretion_table(model_name1, model_name2, uptake1, uptake2, sekretion1, sekretion2)[source]¶

Compute the uptake sekretion overlap

Parameters

  • model_name1 – Name of the model 1

  • model_name2 – Name of the model 2

  • uptake1 – Uptake reactions of model 1

  • uptake2 – Uptake reactions of model 2

  • sekretion1 – Sekretion reactions of model 1

  • sekretion2 – Sekretion reactions of model 2

Returns

Tabel of uptake/sekretions as well as Sekretion -> Uptake relationships.

Return type

DataFrame

This method return the number of unique metabolites in both models .

Parameters

  • model1 (Model) – First cobra model

  • model2 (Model) – Second cobra model

Returns

Total number of metabolites in both models (int): Total number of shared metabolites

Return type

(int)

ncmw.analysis.similarity.get_shared_reactions_counts(model1: cobra.core.model.Model, model2: cobra.core.model.Model)[source]¶

This computes the number of shared reactions

Parameters

  • model1 (Model) – First cobra model

  • model2 (Model) – Second cobra model

  • prefix (str) – Location to write file. Default is “”

Returns

Total number of reactions in both models (int): Total number of shared reactions

Return type

(int)

ncmw.analysis.similarity.jaccard_similarity(model1: cobra.core.model.Model, model2: cobra.core.model.Model)[source]¶

This returns the Jacard Similarity of both models with respect to the set of metabolites and reactions

Parameters

  • model1 (Model) – First cobra model

  • model2 (Model) – Second cobra model

Returns

Jacard similarity of metabolite sets (float): Jacard similarity of reaction sets

Return type

(float)

ncmw.analysis.similarity.jaccard_similarity_matrices(models: Iterable)[source]¶

The methods takes an Iterable of cobra models and returns a dictionary containing all pairwise jaccard similarities.

Parameters

models (Iterable) – List of cobra models

Returns

DataFrame of all jaccard similarities for metabolites indexed by the model ids. (df): DataFrame of all jaccard similarities for reaction indexed by the model ids. (df): DataFrame for resourece overlap indexed by the model ids.

Return type

(df)
